name: Road Trip USA 2: West Collector's Edition
name_original: Road Trip USA 2: West Collector's Edition
description:
Explore beautiful locations spanning the Western states as you hunt for hidden objects. Hidden Object enthusiasts will rejoice with over 2,200 objects to locate across multiple game modes and beautiful hi-resolution scenes! For a change of pace, test your puzzle solving skills against a fun selection of 7 mini games! Don’t miss this trip of a lifetime!

  • Test your US trivia in the finale
  • Multiple search modes – Riddle, Alpha Sort, Scramble, Missing Vowels, and Silhouette
  • Find all the robots to unlock bonus puzzles
  • Find Max, Bear and Ninja the Max the Cat Studio Cats for extra points!

Includes multiple levels of puzzles, increasing in challenge.

  • Match Three
  • Mahjong
  • Jigsaw
  • Tile Slide
  • Block Slide
  • Spot the Difference
  • Solitaire

Play how you want, adjust settings to your desire to match your playing ability or style.
